name: A Werewolf in Berkeley
description:
Charlie left the East Coast to explore California, as well as the human mind. Pursuing a PhD in Psychology under the tutelage of self-important Professor Buttington, the young malcontent becomes increasingly suspicious of everyone around him-- including himself. Under these circumstances, anyone might be driven to lunacy... 

CONTROLS: 

WASD or arrow keys to walk 

Click or "enter" key to talk to people 

Z to travel 

UPDATE: POSTED NEW (working) WINDOWS VERSION. Sorry for the confusion!!

This game was made as a submission for the Narrative Imperative Game Jam in the course of the last two weeks. This game was made by Aiden Mirza, who did the artwork and mechanics. Music and story by Melp Meredith. 

This game takes 15-30 minutes to play through. 

Thank you to everyone who has helped me get to know Berkeley. 

Special thanks to Kaamya Sharma and Chammeili for the use of their song Astory.
